about_the_game:
Give out orders to your workers, tell them what to do and where to do it. Mind their stats, since not every employee is suitable for a specific job. As a proper manager you need to be aware of tools required for the task, otherwise, thing might go sideways, literally.




Open up your tablet and jump into Renovators Network, sophisticated media for connecting you with potential customers. Search through the neighborhood and look for potential contracts. Not every job can be applied for straight away. You need to build up your reputation and have enough resources to perform some of the renovations.




Sometimes giving out simple tasks simply does not work for these guys. Be prepared to precisely instruct an individual on how to perform a given task. Perhaps you thought that you're going to just tell people what to do eh ? Well, it's time to wake up manager, you gotta put in more than you might have expected !




Check what's going on ! You have an access to tools like no other manager. Hunt for any potential time wasters, drunks or any other issues regarding the staff and the building. Remember that deadlines are real thing these days.




Witness the fruits of your work. Admire the job well done.


KEY FEATURES

  • Manage and instruct your workers, develop them
  • Build up your reputation on the market and tackle more challenging renovations
  • Connect to Renovators Network and shop your tools, find contracts and employees
  • Extensive stats and skillsets for each individual worker, manage them wisely
  • Role playing elements
  • Stunning graphics with the power of Unreal Engine 4
detailed_description:
MORE GAMES



About the Game



Give out orders to your workers, tell them what to do and where to do it. Mind their stats, since not every employee is suitable for a specific job. As a proper manager you need to be aware of tools required for the task, otherwise, thing might go sideways, literally.




Open up your tablet and jump into Renovators Network, sophisticated media for connecting you with potential customers. Search through the neighborhood and look for potential contracts. Not every job can be applied for straight away. You need to build up your reputation and have enough resources to perform some of the renovations.




Sometimes giving out simple tasks simply does not work for these guys. Be prepared to precisely instruct an individual on how to perform a given task. Perhaps you thought that you're going to just tell people what to do eh ? Well, it's time to wake up manager, you gotta put in more than you might have expected !




Check what's going on ! You have an access to tools like no other manager. Hunt for any potential time wasters, drunks or any other issues regarding the staff and the building. Remember that deadlines are real thing these days.




Witness the fruits of your work. Admire the job well done.


KEY FEATURES

  • Manage and instruct your workers, develop them
  • Build up your reputation on the market and tackle more challenging renovations
  • Connect to Renovators Network and shop your tools, find contracts and employees
  • Extensive stats and skillsets for each individual worker, manage them wisely
  • Role playing elements
  • Stunning graphics with the power of Unreal Engine 4
name: Renovators

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3.2 GHz, AMD Phenom II X4 955 - 4 Core, 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon R9 280 or Nvidia GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: System requirements are subject to change during the development of the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400, AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 580 or Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: System requirements are subject to change during the development of the game.

short_description: A role playing game where you manage, build and expand your team of workers. Apply for contracts, perform various renovations throughout the city. You are the Renovator.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
